mapper.select: SELECT tamf.*,taf.funUrl,taf.funName ,CASE WHEN tamf.menuOrder = 1 THEN IFNULL((select tamf_.menuName from tb_auth_menu_function tamf_ where tamf_.id = tamf.pid),'根节点') ELSE IFNULL(( SELECT tamf_.menuName FROM tb_auth_menu_function tamf_ WHERE tamf_.pid = tamf.pid AND tamf_.menuOrder = (tamf.menuOrder - 1) LIMIT 1 ),'根节点') END as preNodeName FROM tb_auth_menu_function tamf left join tb_auth_function taf on taf.id = tamf.funId WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY tamf.menuOrder ASC
SELECT * FROM tb_auth_menu_function tamf WHERE 1 = 1 AND tamf.pid = #{pid} order by menuOrder asc

SELECT *, tamf.pid as parentId ,CASE WHEN tamf.pid = 0 THEN -1 ELSE (SELECT tamf1_.pid FROM tb_auth_menu_function tamf1_ WHERE tamf1_.id = tamf.pid) END as parentPid , CASE WHEN tamf.menuOrder = 1 THEN tamf.pid ELSE IFNULL(( SELECT tamf_.id FROM tb_auth_menu_function tamf_ WHERE tamf_.pid = tamf.pid AND tamf_.menuOrder = (tamf.menuOrder - 1) LIMIT 1 ),0) END as preNodeId FROM tb_auth_menu_function tamf WHERE 1 = 1 AND tamf.id = #{id}
